sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

PCRs and HSDs:
1. 12041689, "Gen2.1: Router Tables to have Input of Strapped SBR Instance Value" (filed by John Ayers - CNX/10nm server): The multiple instantiation (MI) feature is updated to ensure that dangling/unused ports do not need to consume portIDs.
2. 1403926875, "Enable ACE Lintra for HDK-FEBE deployment on the Sidenband Router": ACE Lintra is now enabled in the Sideband router environment.
3. 1403981392, "Confirm that the SBR environment is compliant with the latest tool versions in the CNL toolfile": It is confirmed that the SBR environment supports the following tool versions: lintra 14.2p9_shOpt64, questaCDC v10.3, Conformal 14.10.220, Spyglass 5.2.1.6, VisaIt 3.6.4, ace 2.01.23, DC I-2013.12-SP5-2, verdi 2014.03-1.
4. 1403981427, "Update the SBR Integration Guide and Product Brief documents for compliance with document templates 3.0" : The SBR Integration Guide and Product Brief documents are now compliant with document templates 3.0.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:
None.

Validation Updates:

General Updates:
Test support for the RTL updates.

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/home/default.html#magazine?id=101846185&contentId=1012194360

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.php?Proj_id=all&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=RTL1P0&Ver_id=20&showlatest=1
